r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Xanalys Canada. The average
  contract duration was 0.97 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.1M. The longest
  contract was 2.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.3M.
lookup_name: 'XANALYS CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '17%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '76%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '17.2K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.97'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.1M'
s425_max_duration: '2.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.3M'
---
